item.title: Reuse my "old" smartphone
item.author: Author
item.description: A little story… In March 2020, I needed a new phone and I didn’t want to spend a lot of money on a phone so I took one of the best “old” phone in 2017 I bought a refurbished phone, the Google Pixel 2 XL for 200€ (Launch price was 950-1050€, what a decrease) and also I try to spend as little time as possible on it to spend more time on gami… coding and some passions.
